description: Abinadi was a prophet who preached about the coming of Christ to King Noah and his people, and was put to death for it (Mosiah 11-17). He taught that redemption from sin and death comes through the suffering, death, and resurrection of Jesus Christ, the Son of God. Abinadi’s teachings were recorded by Alma I, who had been a priest of King Noah, but was converted by Abinadi’s testimony (Mosiah 17:4).
